item.title: 埃隆-马斯克（Elon Musk）的 "星链"（Starlink）公司走私的套件甚至在其没有运营协议的地区也被激活。这引发了对卫星互联网服务控制权的质疑。
item.description:
Smuggled kits from Elon Musk's Starlink are being activated even in territories where it has no agreement to operate. That raises questions about control of the satellite internet service https://t.co/tioelRva6G

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 25, 2024

item.title: 皇冠度假村保留了墨尔本旗舰赌场的经营许可，此前政府任命的管理者发现该公司已纠正了包括少缴税和协助洗钱在内的错误行为。

item.title: 日本市场的蓬勃发展增加了东京国际银行家的工作量，但有一点没有改变，那就是顽固的低薪问题。
item.description:

item.title: 根据采访，花旗集团的同事在办公室吸食可卡因，以长相评价同事，并盯着女性的身体看。在单位内部，存在着一种被忽视的粗野和权利模式。
item.description:
Citi cohort used cocaine at the office, rated coworkers by looks and stared at women’s bodies, according to interviews. Inside the unit, there has been a pattern of boorishness and entitlement that’s been ignored. https://t.co/WFsfFccp3v

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 25, 2024

item.title: 彭博贸易追踪报告显示，面对持续的供应链中断，强劲的需求使全球货运出现了不太可能出现的反弹。

item.title: 唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）手头拮据，而乔-拜登（Joe Biden）却财源滚滚。这已经开始在他们的竞选活动中显现出来
item.description:

item.title: 瑞波实验室首席执行官布拉德-加林豪斯（Brad Garlinghouse）在 X 日表示，美国证券交易委员会将在有关 XRP 加密代币的法律诉讼中寻求 20 亿美元的罚款和处罚。
item.description:
Ripple Labs CEO Brad Garlinghouse said on X that the SEC will seek $2 billion in fines and penalties in its legal fight over the XRP crypto token. https://t.co/CIJqnD8RV4

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 25, 2024

item.title: 上周，一些可怜的人不小心以每股 10.87 美元的价格赎回了他们手中的 $DWAC 股票。这比当时的交易价格低了 75% 😵‍💫 如今，它的交易价格已接近每股 50 美元。
item.description:
Some poor soul accidentally redeemed their $DWAC shares for $10.87 each last week

That’s a 75% discount to where they were trading at the time 😵‍💫

It’s trading north of $50 a share today https://t.co/xXajPLVva2

— Matt Turner (@Matt_Turnerr) March 25, 2024

item.title: 据知情人士透露，佛罗里达州的高速铁路系统 Brightline 正在向贷款方寻求大约 48 亿美元的新资金，以对其未偿债务进行再融资。
item.description:
Florida’s high-speed rail system, Brightline, is seeking roughly $4.8 billion of new capital from lenders to refinance its outstanding debt, according to people with knowledge of the matter. https://t.co/YHMAIhD0bp

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 25, 2024

item.title: 期权交易表明，随着持有比特币的美国交易所交易基金的需求开始减弱，交易商正在为比特币的长期下跌做好准备
item.description:
Options suggest that traders are bracing for an extended decline in Bitcoin with demand for US exchange-traded funds holding the cryptocurrency beginning to wane https://t.co/nr9UDhfgAX

— Bloomberg Crypto (@crypto) March 24, 2024

item.title: "这开始可能让人联想到上世纪90年代，如果你问我上世纪90年代我们在哪里，我认为我们在1996年12月5日，艾伦-格林斯潘问我们如何知道这是否是非理性繁荣："艾德-雅德尼
item.description:
“This is starting to possibly be reminiscent of the 1990s, and if you ask me where we are in the 1990s, I think we’re at Dec. 5, 1996, where Alan Greenspan asked how do we know if it’s irrational exuberance:" Ed Yardeni https://t.co/dR6GA6V4Dw

— Lisa Abramowicz (@lisaabramowicz1) March 25, 2024
